cdse-s3.title: Copernicus Data Space Ecosystem S3
cdse-s3.description: This endpoint provides access to EO data which is stored on the object storage of both CloudFerro Cloud and OpenTelekom Cloud (OTC). See the [documentation](https://documentation.dataspace.copernicus.eu/APIs/S3.html) for more information, including how to get credentials.

creodias-s3.title: CREODIAS S3
creodias-s3.description: Comprehensive Earth Observation Data (EODATA) archive offered by CREODIAS as a commercial part of CDSE, designed to provide users with access to a vast repository of satellite data without predefined quota limits.

time.description: reference time of the lwq file

num_obs.description: number of observations of the pixel area

first_obs.description: age in days after the start of the observation period of the first observation included in the pixel area

last_obs.description: age in days after the start of the observation period of the last observation included in the pixel area

n_obs_quality_risk_sum.description: number of observations potentially affected by suboptimal observation conditions

stats_valid_obs_tsi_sum.description: number of valid tsi observations of the pixel area

stats_valid_obs_turbidity_sum.description: number of valid turbidity observations of the pixel area

turbidity_mean.description: pixel-mean turbidity derived with Calimnos optical water type dependant blending of total suspended matter algorithms as tuned in the GloboLakes project

turbidity_sigma.description: pixel-stdev turbidity derived with Calimnos optical water type dependant blending of total suspended matter algorithms as tuned in the GloboLakes project

Rw412_rep.description: reflectance at 412 nm in the most representative spectrum of fully normalized water-leaving obtained from polymer atmospheric correction processor

Rw443_rep.description: reflectance at 443 nm in the most representative spectrum of fully normalized water-leaving obtained from polymer atmospheric correction processor

Rw490_rep.description: reflectance at 490 nm in the most representative spectrum of fully normalized water-leaving obtained from polymer atmospheric correction processor

Rw510_rep.description: reflectance at 510 nm in the most representative spectrum of fully normalized water-leaving obtained from polymer atmospheric correction processor

Rw560_rep.description: reflectance at 560 nm in the most representative spectrum of fully normalized water-leaving obtained from polymer atmospheric correction processor

Rw620_rep.description: reflectance at 620 nm in the most representative spectrum of fully normalized water-leaving obtained from polymer atmospheric correction processor

Rw665_rep.description: reflectance at 665 nm in the most representative spectrum of fully normalized water-leaving obtained from polymer atmospheric correction processor

Rw681_rep.description: reflectance at 681 nm in the most representative spectrum of fully normalized water-leaving obtained from polymer atmospheric correction processor

Rw709_rep.description: reflectance at 709 nm in the most representative spectrum of fully normalized water-leaving obtained from polymer atmospheric correction processor

Rw754_rep.description: reflectance at 754 nm in the most representative spectrum of fully normalized water-leaving obtained from polymer atmospheric correction processor

Rw760_rep.description: reflectance at 764 nm in the most representative spectrum of fully normalized water-leaving obtained from polymer atmospheric correction processor

Rw779_rep.description: reflectance at 779 nm in the most representative spectrum of fully normalized water-leaving obtained from polymer atmospheric correction processor

Rw865_rep.description: reflectance at 865 nm in the most representative spectrum of fully normalized water-leaving obtained from polymer atmospheric correction processor

Rw885_rep.description: reflectance at 885 nm in the most representative spectrum of fully normalized water-leaving obtained from polymer atmospheric correction processor

Rw900_rep.description: reflectance at 900 nm in the most representative spectrum of fully normalized water-leaving obtained from polymer atmospheric correction processor

RwDayNum_rep.description: age in days after the start of the observation period of the most representative water-leaving reflectance spectrum

time.description: reference time of the lwq file

links.title: Product history record from the CDSE traceability service

netcdf.title: Water Quality, Calimnos L3 Aggregated product
netcdf.alternate:name: S3
